forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 54, with temperatures falling to around 51 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 45. West wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, a gentle embrace of clouds shrouds the skyline today, nudging the city towards a muted, contemplative stillness. The high waters of the bay reflect the overcast sky, their undulating surfaces almost echoing the whispers of the waning morning. It feels as if a soft blanket hangs over, dampening the edges of skyscrapers that stand sentinel against the backdrop of a fading blue. Fog looms just beyond the Golden Gate Bridge, its veil curling around the hills and hinting at the familiar dance of marine air that often drifts into this vibrant metropolis.

As the day unfolds, temperatures will retreat subtly, inviting those who venture outside to don layers that blend comfort with practicality. A light jacket should suffice against the cool breezes running through the city streets. It's an apt time for leisurely pursuits—perhaps a contemplative stroll along the Embarcadero, where the cool air mingles with the scent of fresh coffee wafting from nearby cafes. Or one might find solace in the pages of a book at a cozy library or art gallery, absorbing the culture that pulses through San Francisco while the clouds hold their quiet watch.
